paragraphs: My name is Sabrina, a creative artist turned Software Engineer, with a BFA in Painting. Combining my artistic roots with a love for technology, I specialize in building dynamic and user-friendly web applications.

Born and raised in New York City, my creative journey began as a freelance artist and content creator. Additionally, I've taken other freelance work in script writing and transcription. In the midst of it, I ended up reigniting my passion for computers and technology, which then inspired me to pursue a new career path in web development.

Currently, I've been focusing on developing modern web applications using JavaScript, React and Node.js. I'm always eager to continue learning the foundations of web programming, as well as learning more modern web technologies to help solve real-world problems and design innovative solutions.

While my primary goal is to continue growing as a Software Engineer, my love for art remains an integral part of who I am. Whether I’m coding or creating, I’m driven by curiosity, creativity, and a commitment to continuous learning.
paragraphs2: My name is Sabrina, a creative artist turned aspiring IT professional. Blending my artistic background with my passion for technology, I’m currently focused on growing my skills in IT support and systems, while continuing to develop web-based applications on the side.

Born and raised in New York City, my creative journey began as a freelance artist and content creator. Along the way, I also worked in script writing and transcription. Over time, my curiosity about technology grew into a serious pursuit, inspiring me to pivot towards IT and technical support.

Currently, I'm learning more about system administration, networking, and troubleshooting, while expanding my skills in Linux, shell scripting, and general IT best practices. I've also been maintaining my interest in frontend web development using JavaScript, React and Node.js/ Express. I'm always eager to continue learning the foundations of web programming, as well as learning more modern web technologies to help solve real-world problems and design innovative solutions.

While my primary goal is to build a career in IT support and infrastructure, my love for art and creativity remains an important part of who I am. Whether I'm solving technical issues or creating something new, I'm driven by curiosity, creativity, and a commitment to continuous learning.
